name: Freestyle Exile - Demo
description:
In Freestyle Exile, you play August, an elite skateboarding assassin in the seedy underworld. 15 years ago, your father was disgraced and tarnished his reputation in the assassin community. You're trying to set things right, by competing in the underworld's most popular game show!

Join the Discord Server For More! Default Controls ActionKeyboard + Mouse
XBOX Gamepad
PlayStation GamepadMovementWASDLeft Stick
